fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Slice and Dice: Target a player. You will throw your fruit knife at them, dealing a Basic attack. If they are visited by any killing roles on the same night, your attack becomes Powerful. If visited by any non-killing roles, your attack becomes Unstoppable.
- Fruit Salad: Choose two players each night to send a fruit basket to. If one of the targets is a Town member, they will be occupied by enjoying the fruits and unable to use their night ability. If both targets are non-Town, they will be healed for one Basic Defense.
- Orchard's Blessing: Once per game, during a Tuesday or Friday, you can meditate in your orchard, gaining temporary invincibility for that night. Any visits to you will be nullified, and you cannot be killed or occupied.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sweet Fragrance: You emit a sweet fragrance that attracts others. If you are visited by a role that targets more than one player, they will be forced to choose you as one of their targets.
- Fruity Resilience: You have a 50% chance to resist any negative effects or attacks during Tuesday and Friday nights.
